data.name: Mac Biskwi Adventures Demo
data.detailed_description:
Once upon a time, there was a little monkey named Mac Biskwi living in the peaceful "Biscuits Island".
But one day, evil creatures landed there to create disorder!

Play as Mac Biskwi in this cute little 2D platformer and help him to bring peace to his kingdom!

Only 3 levels are available in this demo!
data.about_the_game:
Once upon a time, there was a little monkey named Mac Biskwi living in the peaceful "Biscuits Island".
But one day, evil creatures landed there to create disorder!

Play as Mac Biskwi in this cute little 2D platformer and help him to bring peace to his kingdom!

Only 3 levels are available in this demo!
data.short_description: Play as Mac Biskwi in this cute little 2D platformer and help him to bring peace to his kingdom! Be prepared for a really fun game to play, cool effects, amazing musics and awesome levels!
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Traditional Chinese
